Uses of Class
org.assertj.swing.timing.Condition

  • Packages that use Condition 
    Package Description
    org.assertj.swing.core
    Low-level components that enable functional testing of AWT and Swing Components.
    org.assertj.swing.driver
    Component-specific test drivers.
    org.assertj.swing.timing
    Utilities related to timing.

    • Uses of Condition in org.assertj.swing.core

      Subclasses of Condition in org.assertj.swing.core 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ComponentFoundCondition
      Condition that is satisfied if an AWT or Swing Component that matches certain search criteria is found.
      class  EdtSafeCondition
      Condition that is evaluated in the event dispatch thread (EDT.)

    • Uses of Condition in org.assertj.swing.driver

      Subclasses of Condition in org.assertj.swing.driver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  WaitForComponentToShowCondition
      Verifies that an AWT or Swing Component is showing on the screen.
